resources.string: Please rate how the following words describe your mood today:
What was your main cause of stress today?
Is there anything in particular that has affected your mood or stress (optional)
Please do not include anything personally identifiable
Location data is used as part of the Google Fit API
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
Please manually disable your permissions if you do not want data being collected.
Data for these permissions will not be collected and are disabled for this study.
Touch the smiley face, then swipe UP or DOWN to match your current mood.

The following questions refer to heart failure and how it may affect your life. Please read and complete the following questions. There are no right or wrong answers. Please mark the answer that best applies to you.

Heart failure affects different people in different ways. Some feel shortness of breath while others feel fatigue. Please indicate how much you are limited by heart failure (shortness of breath or fatigue) in your ability to do the following activities over the past 2 weeks.
Hi! Let\'s track daily cumulative steps. Use the menu to explore additional actions.
Why are we collecting this info?\n Blood pressure and heart rate are important signs of wellness. By sharing your vitals you help doctors check your health.
Warning:\nYour blood pressure may be high. Please schedule an appointment with your doctor.
Warning:\nYour blood pressure may be low. Please schedule an appointment with your doctor.
Warning:\nYour blood pressure may be high. Please sit quietly for 15 minutes and check your blood pressure again.
Warning:\nYour blood pressure may be high. Please contact a Grady nurse.
Warning:\nThese symptoms may be serious. You should contact your doctor as soon as possible due to:

1. Press SNAP PHOTO and take a clear picture of the study provided blood pressure monitor screen.

2. Drag the scroll wheel to input values.

3. Click either the LEFT or RIGHT ARM button to submit. Repeat steps for other arm.

1. Press SNAP PHOTO and take a clear picture of the study provided blood pressure monitor screen.

2. Drag the scroll wheel to input values.

3. Click SUBTMIT button to submit. Repeat steps for other arm.
